mapper.sql: LABELING_DTL_ID, LABELING_ID, ASSET_ID, REPRINTING_REASON_ID,REPRINTING_REASON_CODE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT DISTINCT 'false' AS QUERYID, LH.LABELING_ID, (CASE WHEN LH.BRANCH_ID = -1 THEN 'Head Office' ELSE (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME FROM WOS_ORGANIZATIONS WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = LH.BRANCH_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) END) BRANCH_NAME FROM SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL LD inner join soc_asset_labeling_hdr LH on LH.LABELING_ID = LD.LABELING_ID WHERE LH.LABELING_ID = #{labelingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
insert into SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL
LABELING_DTL_ID,
LABELING_ID,
ASSET_ID,
REPRINTING_REASON_ID,
REPRINTING_REASON_CODE,
CREATED_BY,
CREATION_DATE,
LAST_UPDATED_BY,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE,
#{labelingDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{labelingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{assetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{reprintingReasonId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{reprintingReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL
LABELING_DTL_ID = #{record.labelingDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LABELING_ID = #{record.labelingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ASSET_ID = #{record.assetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPRINTING_REASON_ID = #{record.reprintingReasonId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPRINTING_REASON_CODE = #{record.reprintingReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{record.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{record.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{record.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL set LABELING_DTL_ID = #{record.labelingDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LABELING_ID = #{record.labelingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSET_ID = #{record.assetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPRINTING_REASON_ID = #{record.reprintingReasonId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPRINTING_REASON_CODE = #{record.reprintingReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{record.creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{record.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{record.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL
LABELING_ID = #{labelingID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ASSET_ID = #{assetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPRINTING_REASON_ID = #{reprintingReasonId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPRINTING_REASON_CODE = #{reprintingReasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where LABELING_DTL_ID = #{labelingDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL set LABELING_ID = #{labelingId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSET_ID = #{assetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPRINTING_REASON_ID = #{reprintingReasonId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPRINTING_REASON_CODE = #{reprintingReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where LABELING_DTL_ID = #{labelingDetailId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from SOC_ASSET_LABELING_DTL
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT DISTINCT A.ASSET_ID, (select description from bse_lookup_dependents where detail_code= A.ASSET_TYPE_CODE) as ASSET_TYPE_NAME, (select segment1 from SOC_EBS_CATEGORIES where category_id =A.CATEGORY_ID) as CATEGORY_NAME, A.ASSET_TYPE_CODE, A.EBS_ASSET_ID, A.ASSET_NUMBER, A.TAG_NUMBER, A.SERIAL_NUMBER, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CATEGORY_ID, A.COMPANY_ID, A.BRANCH_ID, (case when A.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'HEADOFFICE' else (SELECT SUBSTR (ORGANIZATION_CODE, -5) as branch_code from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = A.BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_CODE, (case when A.BRANCH_ID = -1 then 'Head Office' else (SELECT ORGANIZATION_NAME from WOS_ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATION_ID = A.BRANCH_ID and rownum = 1) end )BRANCH_NAME, (SELECT LOCATION_CODE from WOS_LOCATIONS where LOCATION_ID = A.LOCATION_ID and rownum =1) LOCATION_CODE, (SELECT LOCATION_NAME from WOS_LOCATIONS where LOCATION_ID = A.LOCATION_ID and rownum =1) LOCATION_NAME, A.POSITION, A.DATE_PLACED_IN_SERVICE, A.LIFE_IN_MONTHS, A.ORIGINAL_COST, A.UNREVALUED_COST, A.BOOK_TYPE_CODE, A.LAST_PRINTED_DATE, A.PRINTED_COUNT, A.CREATED_BY, A.CREATION_DATE, A.LAST_UPDATE_BY, A.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM SOC_ASSETS A LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = A.LAST_UPDATE_BY
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(*) FROM SOC_ASSETS A LEFT JOIN SAM_USERS U ON U.USER_ID = A.LAST_UPDATE_BY
select PRINTED_COUNT from soc_assets where ASSET_ID = #{assetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
